about_the_game:
About The Game

Enter the world of Haevnaldir, a deck-building medieval strategy game fused with grid-based dungeon crawling. You are a noble lord navigating political intrigue, brutal combat, and dungeon exploration. Manage your kingdom’s factions, build a powerful deck of cards, and face dangerous encounters in turn-based battles.
Key Features

  • Deck-Building Combat – Collect and upgrade powerful cards to dominate turn-based battles.

  • Grid-Based Exploration – Travel across dungeons and overworld maps, discovering secrets and dangers.

  • Faction Loyalty System – Maintain balance between the people, nobles, army, clergy, and economy.

  • Dynamic Events – Your decisions impact the story and gameplay, leading to multiple endings.

  • Rich Medieval Atmosphere – Stunning hand-drawn UI, immersive soundtrack, and deep lore.

Gameplay Breakdown

  • Travel the Kingdom – Explore a procedurally generated overworld and dungeons, encountering challenges along the way.

  • Engage in Tactical Battles – Use your custom-built deck in turn-based combat against enemies, rebels, and political rivals.

  • Manage Kingdom Affairs – Political dilemmas and random events force you to make hard decisions.
